question: Have you identified a new persistent weak layer that needs tracking? Please provide: A descriptive name (e.g., 'Surface Hoar 2025-02-15'), the date it was created/identified, and a comprehensive comment describing formation conditions, burial details, current depth, spatial distribution, stability test results, and ongoing concerns.

name.format: Include crystal type and date (e.g., 'Surface Hoar 2025-02-15')

comment.prompt: Include: formation conditions, burial event, current depth, distribution (aspects/elevations), stability tests, concerns

assessment.note: Assessments must be added via InfoEx UI - cannot be submitted via API

special_notes.frequency: Only create 2-3 PWLs per season when new persistent weak layers are identified
special_notes.workflow: 1) Check if PWL exists (GET), 2) Create if new (POST), 3) Add assessments via InfoEx UI
special_notes.api_limitation: PWL assessments cannot be added via API - use InfoEx web interface
